016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.server;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ServerShutdownStreamException;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.common.ExceptionObjectOutputStream;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWriter;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
025import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
026import org.apache.logging.log4j.Marker;
027import org.apache.logging.log4j.MarkerManager;
028import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferOutputStream2;
029import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferPool;
030import org.eclipse.jetty.io.EofException;
031import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.*;
032import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.exceptions.WebSocketTimeoutException;
033import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
034import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
035import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
036
037import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
040import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
041import java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException;
042import java.util.ArrayDeque;
043import java.util.Base64;
044import java.util.Deque;
045import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
046import java.util.function.Function;
047
048/**
049 * @author rickardoberg
050 * @since 13/04/2022
051 */
052public class PublisherSubscriptionReactiveStream
053        extends ServerReactiveStream
054        implements WebSocketListener, Subscriber<Object> {
055
056    protected final Logger logger;
057
058    private final String streamName;
059    protected volatile Session session;
060
061    private final Function<Configuration, Publisher<Object>> publisherFactory;
062    private Configuration publisherConfiguration;
063    protected Subscription subscription;
064    private boolean isComplete = false;
065
066    private int requested;
067    private final Deque<Object> queue = new ArrayDeque<>();
068    private final ByteBufferOutputStream2 outputStream;
069
070    protected final MessageWriter<Object> messageWriter;
071
072    private final ObjectMapper objectMapper;
073    protected final ByteBufferPool pool;
074    protected final Marker marker;
075
076    private boolean redundancyNotificationIssued = false;
077
078    private long outstandingRequestAmount;
079
080    public PublisherSubscriptionReactiveStream(String streamName,
081                                               Function<Configuration, Publisher<Object>> publisherFactory,
082                                               MessageWriter<Object> messageWriter,
083                                               ObjectMapper objectMapper,
084                                               ByteBufferPool pool,
085                                               Logger logger) {
086        this.streamName = streamName;
087        this.publisherFactory = publisherFactory;
088        this.messageWriter = messageWriter;
089        this.objectMapper = objectMapper;
090        this.pool = pool;
091        marker = MarkerManager.getMarker(streamName);
092
093        outputStream = new ByteBufferOutputStream2(pool, true);
094        this.logger = logger;
095    }
096
097    // Subscriber
098    @Override
099    public synchronized void onSubscribe(Subscription subscription) {
100
101        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
102            logger.trace(marker, "onSubscribe");
103
104        this.subscription = subscription;
105
106        if (outstandingRequestAmount > 0) {
107            subscription.request(outstandingRequestAmount);
108            outstandingRequestAmount = 0;
109        }
110    }
111
112    @Override
113    public synchronized void onNext(Object item) {
114        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
115            logger.trace(marker, "onNext {}", item.toString());
116
117        if (session.isOpen() && requested > 0) {
118            send(item);
119            requested--;
120        } else {
121            queue.add(item);
122        }
123    }
124
125    // WebSocket
126    @Override
127    public synchronized void onWebSocketConnect(Session session) {
128        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
129            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketConnect {}", session.getRemoteAddress().toString());
130
131        this.session = session;
132        session.getRemote().setBatchMode(BatchMode.ON);
133    }
134
135    @Override
136    public synchronized void onWebSocketText(String message) {
137        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
138            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketText {}", message);
139
140        if (publisherConfiguration == null) {
141            // Read JSON parameters
142            try {
143                ObjectNode configurationJson = (ObjectNode) objectMapper.readTree(message);
144                publisherConfiguration = new Configuration.Builder(configurationJson)
145                        .with(addUpgradeRequestConfiguration(session.getUpgradeRequest()))
146                        .build();
147                Publisher<Object> publisher = publisherFactory.apply(publisherConfiguration);
148                publisher.subscribe(this);
149            } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
150                session.close(StatusCode.BAD_PAYLOAD, e.getMessage());
151            }
152        } else {
153            // Handle async
154            CompletableFuture.runAsync(() ->
155            {
156                long requestAmount = Long.parseLong(message);
157
158                synchronized (this) {
159                    if (subscription != null) {
160                        if (requestAmount == Long.MIN_VALUE) {
161                            logger.info(marker, "Received cancel on websocket " + streamName);
162                            session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, "cancelled");
163                        } else {
164                            if (logger.isDebugEnabled())
165                                logger.debug(marker, "Received request:" + requestAmount);
166
167                            Object item;
168                            while (requestAmount > 0 && (item = queue.poll()) != null && session.isOpen()) {
169                                send(item);
170                                requestAmount--;
171                            }
172
173                            if (isComplete) {
174                                if (queue.isEmpty() && requestAmount == 0) {
175                                    // We're done
176                                    session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, "complete");
177                                }
178                            } else {
179                                if (requestAmount > 0) {
180                                    requested += requestAmount;
181                                    subscription.request(requestAmount);
182                                }
183                            }
184
185                        }
186                    } else {
187                        outstandingRequestAmount += requestAmount;
188                    }
189                }
190            });
191        }
192    }
193
194    @Override
195    public synchronized void onWebSocketBinary(byte[] payload, int offset, int len) {
196        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
197            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketBinary");
198
199        if (!redundancyNotificationIssued) {
200            logger.warn(marker, "Receiving redundant results from subscriber");
201            redundancyNotificationIssued = true;
202        }
203    }
204
205    @Override
206    public synchronized void onWebSocketClose(int statusCode, String reason) {
207        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
208            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketClose {} {}", statusCode, reason);
209
210        if (subscription != null) {
211            subscription.cancel();
212            subscription = null;
213        }
214    }
215
216    @Override
217    public synchronized void onWebSocketError(Throwable cause) {
218        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
219            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketError", cause);
220
221        if ((cause instanceof ClosedChannelException ||
222                cause instanceof WebSocketTimeoutException ||
223                cause instanceof EofException)
224                && subscription != null) {
225            // Ignore
226        } else {
227            logger.error(marker, "Publisher websocket error", cause);
228        }
229    }
230
231    protected void send(Object item) {
232        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
233            logger.trace(marker, "send {}", item.getClass().toString());
234
235        // Write event data
236        try {
237            writeItem(messageWriter, item, outputStream);
238
239            // Send it
240            ByteBuffer eventBuffer = outputStream.takeByteBuffer();
241
242            session.getRemote().sendBytes(eventBuffer, new WriteCallback() {
243                @Override
244                public void writeFailed(Throwable x) {
245                    logger.error(marker, "Could not send event", x);
246                    session.close(StatusCode.SERVER_ERROR, x.getMessage());
247                }
248
249                @Override
250                public void writeSuccess() {
251                    CompletableFuture.runAsync(() ->
252                    {
253                        if (queue.isEmpty()) {
254                            if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
255                                logger.trace(marker, "flush");
256                            try {
257                                session.getRemote().flush();
258                            } catch (IOException e) {
259                                logger.error(marker, "Could not flush events", e);
260                                session.close(StatusCode.SERVER_ERROR, e.getMessage());
261                            }
262                        }
263                    });
264                }
265            });
266
267        } catch (Throwable t) {
268            logger.error(marker, "Could not send event", t);
269            session.close(StatusCode.SERVER_ERROR, t.getMessage());
270        }
271    }
272
273    protected void writeItem(MessageWriter<Object> messageWriter, Object item, ByteBufferOutputStream2 outputStream) throws IOException {
274        messageWriter.writeTo(item, outputStream);
275    }
276
277    public synchronized void onError(Throwable throwable) {
278        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
279            logger.trace(marker, "onError", throwable);
280
281        if (throwable instanceof ServerShutdownStreamException) {
282            session.close(StatusCode.SHUTDOWN, throwable.getMessage());
283        } else {
284            // Send exception
285            // Client should receive exception and close session
286            try {
287                ByteArrayOutputStream bout = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
288                ObjectOutputStream out = new ExceptionObjectOutputStream(bout);
289                out.writeObject(throwable);
290                out.close();
291                String base64Throwable = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(bout.toByteArray());
292                session.getRemote().sendString(base64Throwable);
293                session.getRemote().flush();
294            } catch (IOException e) {
295                logger.error(marker, "Could not send exception", e);
296            }
297        }
298    }
299
300    public synchronized void onComplete() {
301        if (logger.isTraceEnabled())
302            logger.trace(marker, "onComplete");
303
304        if (queue.isEmpty()) {
305            if (session.isOpen()) {
306                session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, "complete");
307            }
308        } else {
309            // Wait for requests to drain the remaining items
310            isComplete = true;
311        }
312    }
313}
